title: GL meets UN High Commissioner for Human Rights
body_lines: Minister of Foreign Affairs Professor G.L. Peiris on Wednesday held wide ranging discussions with the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights Michelle Bachelet, at her office in the Palaise des Nations in Geneva.

He was accompanied by Minister of Justice Ali Sabry; Production, Supply and Regulation of Pharmaceuticals State Minister Prof. Channa Jayasumana and Secretary to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Admiral Jayanath Colombage.
